snippet: The United States and Iraq have reached an agreement on legal protections for American commandos deploying into Iraq to assess and advise Iraqi forces, three years after efforts to reach a similar pact for a larger U.S. force failed....

headline.print_headline: US Gets Legal Protections for Forces in Iraq
headline.main: US Gets Legal Protections for Forces in Iraq

lead_paragraph: The United States and Iraq have reached an agreement on legal protections for American commandos deploying into Iraq to assess and advise Iraqi forces, three years after efforts to reach a similar pact for a larger U.S. force failed.
